attributes.action: Give Fabric nightclub its Licence back  !!
attributes.background: Fabric Nightclub plays a massive part in the underground music scene, with recent news that its licence has been revoked we need to do something about it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The closure of Fabric Nightclub appears to be the responsibility of Islington Council.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also petition Islington Council - you can find out more here:

http://democracy.islington.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
